metadata.dc:author: Molto, Jordi
Inchauspe, José
metadata.dc:description: According to the latest figures released by the Spanish Health Ministry, the psychiatric drugs are among the four more expensive kinds of drugs. Moreover, the polls show that usually they are prescribed without authorization to sell them. The physicians of the Health System prescribe the largest amount of psychiatric drugs. They prescribe drugs in the 90 percent of the consultation, 30 percent among them are psychiatric drugs. The 40 percent of the psychiatric disorders are diagnosed by these professionals although the average time of the consultation is about five minutes.
metadata.dc:title: Libertad de prescripción en España.
[The uncontrolled prescription of psychiatric drugs in Spain].
